issues.description: db size not visible in Zabbix monitoring
measures: allow access (trust) of user zabbix from 10.64.9.22/32 in pg_hba.conf on the affected system
issues.orderteam: Database Services (Oracle, MSSQL, Postgre, MYSQL, DB2 LUW)

issues.description: Zabbix templates 'Bal Template APP PostgreSQL', 'Basler_Template_linux_POSTGRES' not assigned to system
measures: apply&configure postgres templates 'Bal Template APP PostgreSQL', 'Basler_Template_linux_POSTGRES' to system in Zabbix
add system details to odbc.ini on Zabbix server
verify if postgres parameters like DB size are displayed in Zabbix monitoring
issues.orderteam: Database Services (Oracle, MSSQL, Postgre, MYSQL, DB2 LUW)

issues.description: incomplete postgres instance documentation: dbs, roles, contact details missing
measures: update the postgres instance documentation in Confluence below https://confluence.baloisenet.com/atlassian/x/MIFMb
hostname violates the Baloise naming convention: don't change the system's hostname!
issues.orderteam: Database Services (Oracle, MSSQL, Postgre, MYSQL, DB2 LUW)
